name: Anime-Generator-Bot
description: A Telegram bot that generates anime images.

MONGO_URI.description: MongoDB URI (optional, if you use MongoDB)

FORCE.description: Force sub channel flag (set to 'true' to enable, otherwise 'false')

CHANNEL_LINK.description: Telegram channel link for forced sub (optional)

CHANNEL_USERNAME.description: Telegram channel username (with @) for forced sub (optional)

NSFW.description: NSFW flag: set to 'true' for NSFW-only content, otherwise 'false'

PORT.description: Port for the web server (Heroku sets this automatically, default is 8000)
